prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Frederic Shields Letter to Dante Gabriel Rossetti, 1881, Accession #11100 , Special Collections Dept., University of Virginia Library, Charlottesville, Va.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: This letter was removed from Alexander Gilchrist's Life of William Blake[Rare Book Division PR4146.G5 1880], and transferred to the Manuscripts Division.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Information
scopecontent.p: This letter, May 1, 1881, from Frederic James Shields (1833-1911), London, England, to Dante Gabriel Rossetti (1828-1882), concerns a corrected proof of Rossetti's. Shields, a landscape artist, mural painter, and illustrator, was a contemporary and close friend of Rossetti; both men's artistic work showed Pre-Raphaelite influence. The proof mentioned in the letter probably relates to Rossetti's Ballads and Sonnets; the copy was sent to the printer before the end of March 1881, with full publication ensuing on October 17, 1881.
